Affiliate Disclaimer

Last updated: January 1, 2025

Transparency Statement

SERP Downloaders believes in transparency and honesty. This page explains our affiliate relationships and how they may affect the content and recommendations on our website.

What Are Affiliate Links?

Affiliate links are special URLs that contain a unique code identifying us as the referrer. When you click on an affiliate link and make a purchase or sign up for a service, we may earn a commission at no additional cost to you.

Our Affiliate Relationships

We may participate in affiliate programs with various companies and services, including but not limited to:

  • Software and tool providers
  • Web hosting services
  • Educational platforms
  • Technology products and services

How We Use Affiliate Links

We only recommend products and services that we genuinely believe can benefit our users. Our affiliate relationships do not influence our editorial independence or the quality of our recommendations.

We commit to:

  • Only promoting products and services we believe in
  • Providing honest and unbiased reviews
  • Clearly disclosing affiliate relationships
  • Prioritizing user value over commission potential

Disclosure Policy

Whenever we include affiliate links in our content, we will clearly disclose this relationship. You may see disclosures such as:

  • "This post contains affiliate links"
  • "We may earn a commission from purchases made through this link"
  • "Affiliate link" labels on specific links

Our Editorial Independence

Our affiliate relationships do not compromise our editorial integrity. We maintain full control over our content and recommendations. We will never:

  • Recommend a product solely because of commission potential
  • Write fake or misleading reviews
  • Hide affiliate relationships from our users
  • Compromise on quality or accuracy for financial gain

Free vs. Paid Alternatives

Our primary focus is providing free download tools and services. When we do recommend paid alternatives or complementary services, we will:

  • Clearly explain why the paid option might be beneficial
  • Always mention free alternatives when available
  • Provide honest comparisons between options
  • Respect your choice to use free alternatives

Your Choice

Using affiliate links is entirely optional. You can:

  • Choose to support us by using our affiliate links
  • Navigate directly to vendors' websites
  • Use any other referral source you prefer

Your experience with our free tools and content remains the same regardless of your choice.

Revenue Use

Any revenue generated from affiliate relationships helps us:

  • Maintain and improve our free download tools
  • Keep our website running and accessible
  • Create new tools and features for users
  • Provide customer support and assistance
  • Continue offering services at no cost to users

FTC Compliance

We comply with the Federal Trade Commission's guidelines on affiliate marketing and endorsements. We believe in being transparent about our business relationships and any potential conflicts of interest.

Updates to This Disclaimer

We may update this Affiliate Disclaimer from time to time to reflect changes in our affiliate relationships or legal requirements. Any updates will be posted on this page with a revised date.

Questions About Affiliates

If you have any questions about our affiliate relationships or would like more information about a specific recommendation, please don't hesitate to contact us:

  • Email: affiliates@serpdownloaders.com
  • Contact Form: Contact Page

Our Promise to You

We promise to always put your interests first. Our recommendations are based on genuine belief in the value they provide, not just commission potential. Your trust is more valuable to us than any affiliate revenue.
